payload.content: The video will cover why the brain creates stories, the problems with telling oneself stories, common scripts people follow, how to drop these scripts through self-anthropology, and how to live a narrative-free life.

content: The video will cover why the brain creates stories, the problems with telling oneself stories, common scripts people follow, how to drop these scripts through self-anthropology, and how to live a narrative-free life.
